page.title: 11CHILDREN'S ACTIVITIES
page.content: Here are some of the activities enjoyed by the children as expressed by them:- "One of my hobbies is swimming. I go every Thursday with my school and on Saturday afternoon to a swimming club. I have quite a lot of distance badges." (10 yr. old) "On Saturdays I go to tap and at tap we do time steps and we do a mime." (6 yr. old) "I like horse riding because you do loads of things like brush the horse and look after the horse and I love trotting and galloping and cantering too." (7 yr. old) "I like going to Ballet because it makes you strong and healthy. In December we are doing a show in Newark. I have good fun." (7 yr. old) "There is a BMX track. There are 6 jumps , a water jump and a little track to go round." (11 yr. old)
